mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS userId, SUM(calories_burned) AS dailyCaloriesBurned, COUNT(*) AS dailySessionsCount, CASE WHEN SUM(calories_burned) >= #{gameDate} THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS dailyGoalAchieved FROM GameSession WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND DATE(start_time) = #{gameDate} GROUP BY user_id
